text:
Students in Ms. Taoâ€™ class were exploring the relationship between the angles formed when two parallel lines are intersected by a transversal. In the following figure, line t is a transversal line intersecting the parallel lines m and n.

The students made conjectures about how to use transformations to show that

Angles 1, 3, 5, and 7 are congruent, and

Angles 2, 4, 6, and 8 are congruent.
Examine each conjecture below. Explain why each method will or will not work to show that the angles are congruent. Use diagrams to help show your reasoning.
